text: I get that, what I'm saying is there is functionality that you need to use drag n drop to get modules into the right form for your corded templates. Or in some cases it just makes it easier, for example template specific presets for fields in a module. Not telling you to use drag n drop instead
What is the best way to get meta descriptions onto the HubSpot Dynamic pages?
You can add them to the head with JS, modern search engines will still crawl it.
thanks <@U26DA9CQ0>
:hugging_face:
Has anyone encountered this with Meetings in HubSpot:  Reminder email rendering issue
these are auto generated and it doesnt look like i have any control
This actually brings up a good point. <@U6GNQ7JBU> with HubDB's dynamic pages, is there a way to include another field perhaps much like title and path that would be able to populate the meta desc?
There is a plan for something like this but nothing implemented yet. For now the best way is to clone the template to HTML and add the header fields
Don't ignore me!

At the moment I don't think there are any plans to add validation to HubSpot Marketing Forms, but the team are aware of the value and have talked about it in the past. I'll pass along your :+1: their way.
sounds good, thanks Shay

so this is a general feedback issue but I am noticing when the system is generating the url automagically for things like blog posts, it doesn strip out characters like ` ; : ?` which are being added to the url. I mean I strip em out manually but should the system be doing that as I dont know many urls that use characters in them like that :thinking_face:
really surprised it doesn't strip that question mark

Leadflows / Popup forms can’t AB test
landing pages have it built in

Anyone noticed that when you select a winner of the A/B test that is the NON winner was translated the winner will not have the translation attached?
